cast.overview: Follow Robbie Williams' journey from childhood, to being the youngest member of chart-topping boyband Take That, through to his unparalleled achievements as a record-breaking solo artist – all the while confronting the challenges that stratospheric fame and success can bring.
cast.title: Better Man

details.biography:
Adil Akram is an actor from the United Kingdom. He trained at ArtsEd and Cambridge University.

Akram started his acting career in 2004. He has appeared in various films like Alexander, Skyfall, Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit, and Spectre, among many others. Akram has also appeared in TV shows like Spy School, New Blood, and Ultimate Force.

Akram has also produced, written, and directed several short films. He is also active in the theater scene in London.
details.name: Adil Akram
